manifest.name: cccc
manifest.description: Claude Code Command Center - Complete command and context management system for AI-assisted development
manifest.author: CCCC Contributors

standard.description: Full workflows including PRD and Epic management (25 commands)

full.description: Complete system with MR workflows and GitLab/GitHub integration (40+ commands)

system.name: yq
system.install: brew install yq || apt-get install yq

system.name: jq
system.install: brew install jq || apt-get install jq

hooks.preInstall:
echo "ğŸš€ Preparing CCCC installation..."
echo "ğŸ“¦ Variant: ${PRISM_VARIANT:-standard}"

# Check if we're in a git repository
if ! git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  echo "âš ï¸  Not in a git repository. CCCC works best with git projects."
  echo "   Initialize git: git init"
fi
hooks.postInstall:
# Create CCCC directory structure
mkdir -p .cccc/context .cccc/prds .cccc/epics .cccc_frozen

# Create initial configuration
cat > .cccc/cccc-config.yml << EOF
# CCCC System Configuration
# This file is created by PRISM installation
git_platform: auto-detect
git_remote: origin
initialized_date: $(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")
prism_installed: true
prism_variant: ${PRISM_VARIANT:-standard}
prism_version: 1.1.0
EOF

# Create .gitignore entries if .gitignore exists
if [ -f .gitignore ]; then
  if ! grep -q "^\.cccc_frozen" .gitignore; then
    echo "" >> .gitignore
    echo "# CCCC system files" >> .gitignore
    echo ".cccc_frozen/" >> .gitignore
    echo "../epic-*" >> .gitignore
  fi
fi

echo ""
echo "âœ… CCCC installed successfully!"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“‹ Available commands for variant '${PRISM_VARIANT:-standard}':"
echo ""

case "${PRISM_VARIANT:-standard}" in
  "minimal")
    echo "  ğŸ“ Context Management:"
    echo "    /context:create   - Create comprehensive project context"
    echo "    /context:prime    - Load context for new session"
    echo "    /context:update   - Update context with recent changes"
    echo "    /context:validate - Check context integrity"
    echo "    /context:close    - Clean session termination"
    echo ""
    echo "  âš™ï¸  System:"
    echo "    /cccc:init        - Initialize CCCC system"
    ;;
  "standard")
    echo "  ğŸ“ Context Management (5 commands):"
    echo "    /context:create, /context:prime, /context:update, /context:validate, /context:close"
    echo ""
    echo "  ğŸ“‹ PRD Workflow (2 commands):"
    echo "    /cccc:prd:new     - Create new PRD with guided discovery"
    echo "    /cccc:prd:parse   - Convert PRD to implementation epic"
    echo ""
    echo "  ğŸ¯ Epic Management (6 commands):"
    echo "    /cccc:epic:analyze, /cccc:epic:decompose, /cccc:epic:sync"
    echo "    /cccc:epic:next-issue, /cccc:epic:update-status, /cccc:epic:archive"
    echo ""
    echo "  ğŸ”„ Issue Management (2 commands):"
    echo "    /cccc:issue:update - Sync issue content from platform"
    echo ""
    echo "  ğŸ› ï¸  Utilities (3 commands):"
    echo "    /utils:push, /utils:rebase-all"
    echo ""
    echo "  âš™ï¸  System:"
    echo "    /cccc:init        - Initialize CCCC system"
    ;;
  *)
    echo "  ğŸ¯ Complete CCCC System - All 40+ commands available!"
    echo ""
    echo "  ğŸ“ Context Management (5 commands)"
    echo "  ğŸ“‹ PRD Workflow (2 commands)"  
    echo "  ğŸ¯ Epic Management (6 commands)"
    echo "  ğŸ”„ Issue Management (3 commands)"
    echo "  ğŸ”€ Merge Request Lifecycle (4 commands)"
    echo "  ğŸ› ï¸  Utilities (3 commands)"
    echo "  âš™ï¸  System (1 command)"
    ;;
esac

echo ""
echo "ğŸ¯ Next steps:"
echo "  1. Run: /cccc:init"
echo "     â€¢ Initialize CCCC system"
echo "     â€¢ Choose git platform (GitHub/GitLab)"
echo ""
echo "  2. Run: /context:create"
echo "     â€¢ Set up comprehensive project context"
echo "     â€¢ Never lose context between sessions"
echo ""
echo "  3. Start your workflow:"
case "${PRISM_VARIANT:-standard}" in
  "minimal")
    echo "     â€¢ Use /context:prime at start of each session"
    echo "     â€¢ Use /context:update before ending sessions"
    ;;
  "standard")
    echo "     â€¢ Create PRDs: /cccc:prd:new <feature-name>"
    echo "     â€¢ Generate epics: /cccc:prd:parse <feature-name>"
    echo "     â€¢ Manage issues: /cccc:epic:next-issue"
    ;;
  *)
    echo "     â€¢ Complete workflow: PRD â†’ Epic â†’ Issues â†’ MR â†’ Review â†’ Merge"
    echo "     â€¢ Full GitLab/GitHub integration available"
    ;;
esac
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“š Documentation: https://github.com/penguindepot/cccc"
echo "ğŸ› Issues: https://github.com/penguindepot/cccc/issues"
hooks.preUninstall:
echo "ğŸ—‘ï¸  Preparing to uninstall CCCC..."

# Backup configuration and data
if [ -d ".cccc" ]; then
  echo "ğŸ’¾ Backing up CCCC data to .cccc.backup..."
  cp -r .cccc .cccc.backup
fi

# Check for active work
EPIC_DIRS=$(ls -d ../epic-* 2>/dev/null | head -5)
if [ -n "$EPIC_DIRS" ]; then
  echo "âš ï¸  Warning: Found active epic worktrees:"
  echo "$EPIC_DIRS"
  echo "   Consider cleaning these up manually or running /cccc:epic:archive"
fi

# Check for uncommitted work
if [ -d ".git" ] && [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then
  echo "âš ï¸  Warning: Uncommitted changes detected"
  echo "   Consider committing your work before uninstalling"
fi
hooks.postUninstall:
echo ""
echo "âœ… CCCC has been uninstalled successfully"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ’¾ Your data has been preserved:"
echo "  â€¢ Project context â†’ .cccc.backup/"
echo "  â€¢ PRDs and epics â†’ .cccc.backup/"
echo "  â€¢ Configuration â†’ .cccc.backup/cccc-config.yml"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ§¹ Manual cleanup (optional):"
echo "  rm -rf .cccc.backup      # Remove backup"
echo "  rm -rf ../epic-*         # Remove epic worktrees"
echo "  # Edit .gitignore to remove CCCC entries"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ”„ To reinstall CCCC:"
echo "  prism install cccc --variant=<minimal|standard|full>"
echo ""
echo "Thank you for using CCCC! ğŸš€"
echo "â­ Star us on GitHub: https://github.com/penguindepot/cccc"
